entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Aspire]: Dashboard does not show logs when using dotnet watch #44319
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch IDE protocol doesn't update any process state #44318
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch crashes after a few edits using Visual Studio #44317

Closed

  • Consider reporting agent log content through pipe back to dotnet-watch on each apply change #43323
  • Exception when changing files using dotnet watch with hot reload in Aspire #44260
    9.0.2xx
  • CTRL+R will restart entire process even though the option to restart mentions the single application that was changed #44261
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Project graph restore #44322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix installing dependencies in vmr-build.yml #44314
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable signing on all except pgo #44306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Generate VSMSBuildExtension package in join point #44288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
